game.name: Super Ball Blast
game.description:
The extremely challenging and addictive arcade challenge is out! Do you want to give it a try, make some good score and show off the world that you are a real arcade champion? If yes, join Super Ball Blast and be prepared to shoot all of the balls that see in the sky and jumping on the ground. Your good performance will also help you to upgrade your cannon and survive for long. It requires skill to shoot the falling blocks so be careful all the time.

All you need to do is just press your finger on the keys or tap the screen of your mobile phone to fire balls from your cannon in this fun online hyper casual game! It sounds easy to play, but you have to challenge your shooting and cannon handing skills to reach a higher score. Make sure that you shoot all of the balls to upgrade your cannon timely. The upgraded cannon will definitely help to grab more money when you play.

When you shoot, the balls falling from top to bottom will get divided in several parts. Be careful and try to keep your vehicle away from those balls. Remember the stars falling from the balls will also help you earn extra points. It is up to you how wisely you blast balls while keeping your character away from them. Use the arrow keys or tap the screen of your mobile phone to move your car with cannon! Good luck to clear all balls to create your new best score!
